description: Admire the majesty and grace of Netravali waterfall, spread over sprawling 211 sq. km area. Located and preserved as wildlife sanctuary of Western Ghat Range, Netravali Waterfalls allures all nature lovers and enthusiasts.
name: Netravali Waterfalls

description: With the backdrop of Ambe ghat, Bamanbudo is yet another charming spring. Located right on the road, there is no need of trekking to reach Bamanbudo â€“ one of the unexplored waterfalls in south Goa.
name: Bamanbudo Waterfall

description: As one of the popular waterfalls in Verna Goa. Kaylk Waterfalls attract not only nature lovers and tourist, but also hard core trekkers. Frequently visited by locals and tourists, it stays crowded during weekends.
name: Kaylk Waterfall

description: The Charavane waterfalls is one piece of untouched mother nature. This quite little village is filled with lush green beauty. Its a beautiful site to see with many small and big waterfall and ideal for those who love to go tracking.
name: Charavane Waterfall

description: Budruk is blessed by four waterfalls which exhibit the identity through their flow. However they offer marvelous sight of the waterfalls. Though waterfalls from Savarde and Kumthal are small, they provide most soothing experience of the lush green facet of Goa.
name: Shelop Waterfall

description: Mainapi waterfall is around 14km from netravali village.
name: Mainapi Waterfall

description: This waterfall is a hidden gem, very popular with the locals,but not so with tourists. The waterfall is near to the road, so not much of trekking has to be done to reach it.
name: Karmalya Waterfalls

description: Located in the village of Saleli in Sattari, as it attracts the several adventurers in the monsoon.It is a seasonal waterfall that comes alive only in monsoons.The village is around 11 km from the Valpoi town.
name: Saleli Waterfall
